emailTemplate.subject: Login from a new location
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

We noticed a login to your {APP_NAME} account from a new location.

If this was you, you may disregard this email.

If this wasn't you, you should immediately change your {APP_NAME} account password to revoke access from all other locations.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

emailTemplate.subject: OTP for {APP_NAME}
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

Your one-time password is: {OTP}

If you didn't ask for the one-time password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

verificationTemplate.subject: Verify your {APP_NAME} email
verificationTemplate.body:
Hello,

Thank you for joining us at {APP_NAME}.

Click on the button below to verify your email address.

Verify

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

resetPasswordTemplate.subject: Reset your {APP_NAME} password
resetPasswordTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to reset your password.

Reset password

If you didn't ask to reset your password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

confirmEmailChangeTemplate.subject: Confirm your {APP_NAME} new email address
confirmEmailChangeTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to confirm your new email address.

Confirm new email

If you didn't ask to change your email address, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

emailTemplate.subject: New login to your Luvora account
emailTemplate.body:
LUVORA
🟢

New Login Detected

We noticed a new login to your Luvora account. If this was you, no action is needed.

When

{APP_NAME} Login - Just now

Account

{RECORD:email}

Wasn't you?

Secure My Account

This is an automated security alert. You're receiving this because login alerts are enabled for your account.

emailTemplate.subject: Your Luvora verification code
emailTemplate.body:
LUVORA
🔑

Your Verification Code

Use the code below to complete your verification. Do not share this code with anyone.

{OTP}

Tip: Luvora will never ask you for this code via phone or email. Only enter it on luvora.love

This code expires in 10 minutes.

If you didn't request this code, someone may be trying to access your account. Please secure your account.

verificationTemplate.subject: Verify your Luvora account
verificationTemplate.body:
LUVORA
✉

Verify Your Email

Welcome to Luvora! Please verify your email address to start receiving daily sparks and unlock all features.

Verify Email Address

Or copy and paste this link:

{ACTION_URL}

This link expires in 2 hours.

If you didn't create a Luvora account, you can safely ignore this email.

resetPasswordTemplate.subject: Reset your Luvora password
resetPasswordTemplate.body:
LUVORA
🔒

Reset Your Password

We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password for your account.

Reset Password

Or copy and paste this link:

{ACTION_URL}

This link expires in 1 hour.

If you didn't request this password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

confirmEmailChangeTemplate.subject: Confirm your new email address
confirmEmailChangeTemplate.body:
LUVORA
✉

Confirm Your New Email

You requested to change your email address. Click the button below to confirm this change.

New Email

{RECORD:email}
Confirm Email Change

Or copy and paste this link:

{ACTION_URL}

This link expires in 1 hour.

If you didn't request this change, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password.

name: _authOrigins
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_authOrigins_unique_pairs` ON `_authOrigins` (collectionRef, recordRef, fingerprint)

name: _externalAuths
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_externalAuths_record_provider` ON `_externalAuths` (collectionRef, recordRef, provider)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_externalAuths_collection_provider` ON `_externalAuths` (collectionRef, provider, providerId)

name: blog_posts
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_blog_posts_slug ON blog_posts (slug)
